 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרִיסָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** meaning dubious, usually ==coarse meal==; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#AV|AV]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] dough, so Toy (with ?) (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְסָן‎</span> ***barley-meal***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (in Lexicons) ***hulled barley***, or (compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>GGN 1889, 301 f.</sup>) ***wheat***); &gt; [[BDB#Sm|Sm]]<sup>Ez</sup> [[BDB#Co|Co]]<sup>Ez</sup> ==kneading-trough== (so Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרִיסָה‎</span> [[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]; apparently secondary, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרִיסָה‎</span> also [***bed***], ***cradle***, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערשׂ‎</span>); — only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵאשִׁית עֲרִיסֹתֵיכֶם‎</span> [[Ezek.44.30|Ezek 44:30]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרִיסֹתֵינוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Neh.10.38|Neh 10:38]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרִסֹתֵיכֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Num.15.20|Num 15:20]]; [[Num.15.21|Num 15:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְעָר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַרְעֹר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרֹעֵר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרוֺעֵר‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערר‎</span>.
